verses.text: \w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w against|strong="H4124"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w* \w in|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* \w ruined|strong="H7703"\w*, \w destroyed|strong="H7703"\w* \w in|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*! \w Kir|strong="H7024"\w* \w in|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* \w devastated|strong="H7703"\w*, \w destroyed|strong="H7703"\w* \w in|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*!

\w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w* \w goes|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* temple \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w weep|strong="H1065"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w*. \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w wails|strong="H3213"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w*, \w as|strong="H5927"\w* well \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Medeba|strong="H4311"\w*. \w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* shaved, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w beard|strong="H2206"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w cut|strong="H1639"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* wear \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*; \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rooftops|strong="H1406"\w* \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* public \w squares|strong="H7339"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w wail|strong="H3213"\w*, falling \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*.

\w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* Elealeh \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w*; \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w voices|strong="H6963"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jahaz|strong="H3096"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w soldiers|strong="H2502"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w*; \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* tremble \w within|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5927"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w cries|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w over|strong="H5927"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*; \w her|strong="H1870"\w* \w fugitives|strong="H1280"\w* flee \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Zoar|strong="H6820"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* Eglath-shelishiyah.\f + \fr 15:5 \ft Or Zoar, like a heifer three years of age.\f* \w With|strong="H5927"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w ascend|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w slope|strong="H4608"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Luhith|strong="H3872"\w*; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w lament|strong="H2201"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Horonaim|strong="H2773"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Nimrim|strong="H5249"\w* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w withered|strong="H3001"\w*; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w vegetation|strong="H1877"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w gone|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* greenery \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* wealth \w and|strong="H6213"\w* belongings \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Willows|strong="H6155"\w*.\f + \fr 15:7 \ft Or Poplars\f*

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w outcry|strong="H2201"\w* echoes \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3588"\w* \w wailing|strong="H3215"\w* \w reaches|strong="H5704"\w* Eglaim; \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3588"\w* Beer-elim.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Dimon|strong="H1775"\w* \f + \fr 15:9 \ft MT, twice in this verse; DSS and Vulgate Dibon; Dimon, a wordplay on Dibon (see verse 2), sounds like the Hebrew for blood.\f* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w bring|strong="H7896"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Dimon|strong="H1775"\w*â€” \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fugitives|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land.
